Vehicle.Name: Darvro-Class Light Freighter
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Darvro-Class Light Freighter[h3] [P]Along with the Tallanx fighter, the Darvro is a ship built on stealth and speed commonly used by the Ord Gimmel Defense Fleet. Named after a beast of burden found in the rural regions of Ord Gimmel, the Darvro is a highly effective smuggling vessel. Fitted with a cloaking device and equipped with numerous smuggling compartments and an ECM suite, the ship is designed to evade enemies rather than confront them directly. [P]Used by the Rebel Alliance to smuggle high-profile prisoners, passengers, and cargo through Imperial lines, the Darvro is also equipped with a powerful self-destruct mechanism so that its contents—whatever they may be—don’t fall into enemy hands.
